actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 39 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide automotive adaptive equipment to certain veterans who do not presently qualify for benefits under such chapter.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide automotive adaptive equipment to veterans with service-connected disabilities who do not presently qualify for benefits, where such disabled veterans meet the standards set forth in this Act. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 1904).

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 39 of title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide automotive adaptive equipment to certain veterans who do not presently qualify for benefits under such chapter.
